snippet.title: Monaco 2 | Gameplay Trailer | Humble Games
snippet.description:
Monaco 2 is the sequel to the 2013 cooperative indie heist game, Monaco. This gameplay trailer showcases the protagonists of this action-packed follow-up, which is set to be released soon on PC. Test out the co-op demo with friends NOW for Steam Next Fest!

Steam Page: https://bit.ly/Monaco2_on_Steam

Key Features:

🤝 Assemble Your Crew – They say there’s no honor among thieves, but they’ve never met your crew!  Team up with up to three other players in local or online multiplayer to finish the job.

🎭 Utilize Your Skills – Choose from a selection of eight playable characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Need to adapt? Switch your character mid-run to overcome whatever obstacles stand between you and untold riches! 💰

🗺️ Hatch the Perfect Plan – Every heist requires careful planning. With Blueprint Mode, you can analyze the level’s layout before you start the mission and craft the best approach. 🎯

⚡ Endless Thrills – Complete the structured campaign or test your skills against hundreds of procedurally generated seeded levels. 💨 Prove once and for all that you and your friends are the ultimate thieves! 🕶️💎

____________________________________
Follow Humble Games: 
Twitter: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_TW 
Instagram: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_IG 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/HumbleGames_FB
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/humble

Subscribe to our newsletter: https://www.humblegames.com/

#humblegames #stayhumble #monaco2
